channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report E-2024120313
item.description:

item.title: Report E-2024120370
item.description:
Report E-2024120370

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-20
  • City: GARYVILLE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG SPECIALTY PRODUCTS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Specialty Products Group, LLC driver failed to completely close a valve during the unloading process. This allowed approximately 15 gallons of zinc sulfate to be released. Customer personnel handled the clean-up.
